question: RBI allows this bank to continue banking services under restriction.
explanation: The Central Bank of India, Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has instructed the Rupee Co-op Bank of Pune to continue its banking services keeping the limitations in mind. Restriction were first imposed on February 22, 2103 to August 2013 and that was extended 8 times till May 2018. Restriction were first imposed on February 22 ,2013 to August 2013 and that was extended 8 times till May 2018.
